security: The document pertains to an interview and contact report regarding Juanita Brown's association with Lee Harvey Oswald during his employment at the William B. Rielly Coffee Co. Disclosing personal details like Brown's address, phone number, and social security number could compromise her privacy.
summary: This document summarizes an interview with Juanita Brown, an employee of William B. Rielly Coffee Co., regarding her recollections of Lee Harvey Oswald during his time working there.
summary_one_paragraph: On June 1, 1978, HSCA investigator Robert Buras interviewed Juanita Brown, who worked at the William B. Rielly Coffee Co., to gather information about Lee Harvey Oswald's employment there. Brown recalled that Oswald occasionally visited Adrain Alba's garage next to the company during breaks but stated she did not speak to him and could not recall any other coworkers who might have interacted with him. The interview and outside contact report document Brown's personal information, including her address, phone number, date of birth, and details regarding her employment at the William B. Rielly Coffee Co.
title: JFK Assassination System Identification Form
